======================================================================================================================================================================================================
====================================================================================================================================================================================================== ======================================================================================================================================================================================================
====================================================================================================================================================================================================== You should make contacts \"visible to others\" in two cases. First, you trust them and like quality of products/services offered by them and you want to refer this person to your connections. Second, you want to be referred by these contacts so that you can sell your products/services to their contacts. Nobody would be able to see these contacts. If someone has kept your contact hidden, any contacts of this person would not able to search you.\n\nSimilarly, you would not be able to search any of his contacts to find right connections (referrals) even if you have kept this person \"visible to others\" in your phone.\n\nYou would end up losing a good referral opportunity.\n\nHowever, it is good way to hide important contacts and contacts not worth referring from others Instead, recommend someone else in your contact?
======================================================================================================================================================================================================
